description: Tamukeyama Japanese Maple is an amazing plant species. Featuring dramatic red and purple foliage, the Tamukeyama is one of the most attractive maples around. It produces gorgeous foliage in the late spring and keeps its color throughout the summer months. In the autumn, the leaves turn a striking orange-yellow. Tamukeyama is also known for its full, dense canopy and compact form, making it an ideal choice for smaller gardens, courtyards, and containers. With minimal maintenance, this low-maintenance, moderate-growing maple can lend beauty and interest to the landscape for years to come.
